00045 /*! This class provides methods to access the data of a DataSet. */
00046 class DataSet
00047 {
00048 public:
00049         /*! Constructor. Use this constructor do access the data using memory-mapping.
00050          *      On Windows, memory-mapping will be restricted to 200MB view of the DataSet data.
00051          *      @param fileName The name of the generic file to access.
00052          *      @param header The DataSetHeader of the DataSet to access.
00053          *      @param handle A handle to the file mapping object
00054          *      @param loadEntireDataSetHint Indicate if DataSet will attempt to read the entire DataSet data into a memory buffer.
00055          */
00056         DataSet(const std::string& fileName, const affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetHeader& header, void* handle, bool loadEntireDataSetHint=false);
00057 
00058 
00059         /*! Constructor. Use this constructor do access the data using std::ifstream.
00060          *      With fstream access the entire DataSet data will be read into memory.
00061          *      @param fileName The name of the generic file to access.
00062          *      @param header The DataSetHeader of the DataSet to access.
00063          *      @param ifs A reference to an open ifstream.
00064          *      @param loadEntireDataSetHint Indicate if DataSet will attempt to read the entire DataSet data into a memory buffer.
00065          */
00066         DataSet(const std::string& fileName, const affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetHeader& header, std::ifstream& ifs, bool loadEntireDataSetHint=false);
00067 
00068 public:
00069         /*! Method to release memory held by this object.  Closes object before deleting. */
00070         void Delete();
00071 
00072         /*! Method to open the DataSet to access the data.
00073          *      @return true if successful
00074          */
00075         bool Open();
00076 
00077         /*! Method to close the DataSet. */
00078         void Close();
00079 
00080         /*! Method to get a reference to the DataSetHeader
00081          *      @return A reference to the DataSetHeader.
00082          */
00083         const affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetHeader& Header() { return header; }
00084 
00085         /*! Return the number of rows in the DataSet. */
00086         int32_t Rows() { return header.GetRowCnt(); }
00087 
00088         /*! Return the number of columns in the DataSet. */
00089         int32_t Cols() { return header.GetColumnCnt(); }
00090 
00091         /*! Determines if the DataSet is open
00092          *      @return true if the DataSet is open
00093          */
00094         bool IsOpen() { return (isOpen); }
00095 
00096         /*! Provides access to single data elements
00097          *      @param row Row index.
00098          *      @param col Column index.
00099          *      @param value Reference to the data type to fill with the data.
00100          *      @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotOpenException The file is not memory-mapped.
00101          */
00102         void GetData(int32_t row, int32_t col, u_int8_t& value);
00103 
00104         void GetData(int32_t row, int32_t col, int8_t& value);
00105 
00106         void GetData(int32_t row, int32_t col, u_int16_t& value);
00107 
00108         void GetData(int32_t row, int32_t col, int16_t& value);
00109 
00110         void GetData(int32_t row, int32_t col, u_int32_t& value);
00111 
00112         void GetData(int32_t row, int32_t col, int32_t& value);
00113 
00114         void GetData(int32_t row, int32_t col, float& value);
00115 
00116         void GetData(int32_t row, int32_t col, std::string& value);
00117 
00118         void GetData(int32_t row, int32_t col, std::wstring& value);
00119 
00120         /*! Provides access to multiple data elements in the same column.
00121          *      If count elements could not be read, it is not considered an error.  The vector
00122          *      is filled with only the data that could be read.
00123          *      @param col Column index.
00124          *      @param startRow Row index of the data to be inserted into the vector at [0].
00125          *      @param count Number of elements to retrieve. -1 indicates to read all
00126          *      @param values Reference to the data type to fill with the data.
00127          *      @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotOpenException The file is not memory-mapped.
00128          */
00129 
00130         void GetData(int32_t col, int32_t startRow, int32_t count, Uint8Vector& values);
00131 
00132         void GetData(int32_t col, int32_t startRow, int32_t count, Int8Vector& values);
00133 
00134         void GetData(int32_t col, int32_t startRow, int32_t count, Uint16Vector& values);
00135 
00136         void GetData(int32_t col, int32_t startRow, int32_t count, Int16Vector& values);
00137 
00138         void GetData(int32_t col, int32_t startRow, int32_t count, Uint32Vector& values);
00139 
00140         void GetData(int32_t col, int32_t startRow, int32_t count, Int32Vector& values);
00141 
00142         void GetData(int32_t col, int32_t startRow, int32_t count, FloatVector& values);
00143 
00144         void GetData(int32_t col, int32_t startRow, int32_t count, std::vector<std::string>& values);
00145 
00146         void GetData(int32_t col, int32_t startRow, int32_t count, WStringVector& values);
00147 
00148         /*! Provides access to multiple data elements in the same column.
00149          *      The caller is responsible for allocating the storage to which count element values can be written.
00150          *      If count elements could not be read, it is not considered an error.  The array
00151          *      is filled with only the data that could be read.
00152          *      @param col Column index.
00153          *      @param startRow Row index of the data to be inserted into the vector at [0].
00154          *      @param count Number of elements to retrieve. -1 indicates to read all
00155          *      @param values Reference to the data type to fill with the data.
00156          *      @return Number of elements read.
00157          *      @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotOpenException The file is not memory-mapped.
00158         */
00159 
00160         int32_t GetDataRaw(int32_t col, int32_t startRow, int32_t count, u_int8_t* values);
00161 
00162         int32_t GetDataRaw(int32_t col, int32_t startRow, int32_t count, int8_t* values);
00163 
00164         int32_t GetDataRaw(int32_t col, int32_t startRow, int32_t count, u_int16_t* values);
00165 
00166         int32_t GetDataRaw(int32_t col, int32_t startRow, int32_t count, int16_t* values);
00167 
00168         int32_t GetDataRaw(int32_t col, int32_t startRow, int32_t count, u_int32_t* values);
00169 
00170         int32_t GetDataRaw(int32_t col, int32_t startRow, int32_t count, int32_t* values);
00171 
00172         int32_t GetDataRaw(int32_t col, int32_t startRow, int32_t count, float* values);
00173 
00174         int32_t GetDataRaw(int32_t col, int32_t startRow, int32_t count, std::string* values);
00175 
00176         int32_t GetDataRaw(int32_t col, int32_t startRow, int32_t count, std::wstring* values);
00177 
00178         /*! Check that the requested data matches the type of data in the column and that row and column are in bounds.
00179          *      @param row Row index to check.
00180          *      @param col Column index to check.
00181          *      @param type Column type to check.
00182          *      @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotOpenException The file is not memory-mapped.
00183          *      @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::ColumnIndexOutOfBoundsException The column index is out-of-bounds.
00184          *      @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::RowIndexOutOfBoundsException The row index is out-of-bounds.
00185          *      @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::UnexpectedColumnTypeException The column type does not match the type requested.
00186          */
00187         void CheckRowColumnAndType(int32_t row, int32_t col, affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetColumnTypes type);

00190 
00191         /*! Return the bytes per row.
00192          *      @return Bytes in a row.
00193          */
00194         int32_t BytesPerRow() { return columnByteOffsets[header.GetColumnCnt()]; }

00198         ~DataSet();

00200 protected:
00201         /*! Open the DataSet using memory-mapping
00202          *      @return True if the DataSet was successully mapped.
00203          */
00204         bool OpenMM();
00205 
00206         /*! Read the DataSet data into a buffer using ifstream::read.
00207          */
00208         void ReadDataSetUsingStream();
00209 
00210         /*! Close the memory mapped file. */
00211         void UnmapFile();
00212 
00213         /*! Delete the DataSet data read in by ifstream::read */
00214         void ClearStreamData();
00215 
00216         /*! Returns the address of a data element given a row and column.  Ensures that data from rowStart
00217          *      to rowCount+rowStart are mapped unless that is larger than the mapped window.
00218          *      @param rowStart Row index
00219          *      @param col Column index
00220          *      @param rowCount The number of rows to ensure are mapped starting at rowStart
00221          *      @return Pointer to the data element at rowStart
00222          *      @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotOpenException The file is not open.
00223          *      @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetRemapException There was an error during a remap.
00224          */
00225         char* FilePosition(int32_t rowStart, int32_t col, int32_t rowCount=1);
00226 
00227         /*! Returns the address of a data element given a row and column.  Ensures that data from rowStart
00228          *      to rowCount+rowStart are copied from the file into a memory buffer.  The memory buffer will
00229          *      remain intact until the next call to LoadDataAndReturnFilePosition.
00230          *      @param rowStart Row index
00231          *      @param col Column index
00232          *      @param rowCount The number of rows to ensure are mapped starting at rowStart
00233          *      @return Pointer to the data element at rowStart
00234          *      @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotOpenException The file is not open.
00235          */
00236         char* LoadDataAndReturnFilePosition(int32_t rowStart, int32_t col, int32_t rowCount);
00237 
00238         /*! Updates the columnByteOffsets member. */
00239         void UpdateColumnByteOffsets();
00240 
00241         /*! Computes the index of the row after last to read.
00242          *      @param startRow Row index of the data to be inserted into the vector at [0].
00243          *      @param count Number of elements to be retrieved. -1 indicates read to the last element.
00244          *      @return Index of row after the last row to read.
00245          */
00246         int32_t ComputeEndRow(int32_t startRow, int32_t count);
00247 
00248         /*!     Clears and resizes the vector
00249          *      @param values Reference to a vector to clear and resize.
00250          *      @param size Target size of the vector
00251          */
00252         template<typename T> void ClearAndSizeVector(std::vector<T>& values, u_int32_t size);
00253 
00254         /*! Template method to get data into a vector
00255          *      @param col Column index.
00256          *      @param startRow Row index of the data to be inserted into the vector at [0].
00257          *      @param count Number of elements to retrieve. -1 indicates to read all
00258          *      @param values Reference to the data type to fill with the data.
00259          *      @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotOpenException The file is not memory-mapped.
00260          */
00261         template<typename T> void GetDataT(int32_t col, int32_t startRow, int32_t count, T& values);
00262 
00263         /*! Template method to get data into an array
00264          *      @param col Column index.
00265          *      @param startRow Row index of the data to be inserted into the vector at [0].
00266          *      @param count Number of elements to retrieve. -1 indicates to read all
00267          *      @param values Reference to the data type to fill with the data.
00268          *      @return Number of elements read.
00269          *      @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotOpenException The file is not memory-mapped.
00270          */
00271         template<typename T> int32_t GetDataRawT(int32_t col, int32_t startRow, int32_t count, T* values);

00277         int32_t LastRowMapped();
